answerText: Tanabe-Sugano diagram[10] Orgel diagrams only include terms with the same value of this as the ground state. This value is written as a superscript when writing out a electronic state.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Michigan A + George Mason | 7 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This diagram that is similar to an Orgel diagram plots the ligand field splitting parameter against energy. For 10 points each: [10] Name this diagram useful for finding transition energies for strong and weak field complexes which is helpful in predicting the absorption of EM radiation by complexes.
